data.comment: The match is underway at San Mames.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
In the minute 7, Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In the minute 9, Goal! Youssef En-Nesyri gives Sevilla a 0-1 lead in Bilbao.
Great play from Lucas Ocampos to set up the goal.
Oier Zarraga for Bilbao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Sevilla at San Mames.
Sevilla are coming forward and Marcos Acuna gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Jesus Navas is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Sevilla’s Jesus Navas is on his feet again at San Mames.
Free kick Sevilla.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
Throw-in high up the field for Sevilla in Bilbao.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Bilbao at San Mames.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Sevilla.
In the minute 21, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Sevilla throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Free kick Sevilla.
Diego Carlos (Sevilla) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Bilbao defenders.
In the minute 24, Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Bilbao.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
Fernando is booked for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Raul Garcia (Bilbao) gets a yellow card.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Sevilla a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 35, Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Bilbao throw-in in Sevilla's half.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao.
In the minute 40, Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Bilbao surge into the attack at San Mames but Raul Garcia’s header is off-target.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Sevilla at San Mames.
Youssef En-Nesyri (Sevilla) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sevilla to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Sevilla at San Mames.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at San Mames.
The second half has started at San Mames.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 47, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sevilla push forward at San Mames and Youssef En-Nesyri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bilbao defence.
Youssef En-Nesyri of Sevilla gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 51, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Sevilla.
In the minute 53, Inigo Martinez (Bilbao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Unai Lopez is on a sub for Oier Zarraga for Bilbao.
Bilbao make their second substitution with Asier Villalibre replacing Raul Garcia.
In the minute 55, In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sevilla needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Bilbao at San Mames.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 60, Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 61, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
At San Mames, Inaki Williams has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
Jules Kounde (Sevilla) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Julen Lopetegui (Sevilla) is making a first substitution, with Franco Vazquez replacing Youssef En-Nesyri.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bilbao.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Bilbao push upfield and Inaki Williams gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Sevilla defence.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Bilbao's Dani Garcia is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikel Vesga is replacing Dani Garcia for Bilbao at San Mames.
Gaizka Garitano is making the team's fourth substitution at San Mames with Iker Muniain replacing Alex Berenguer.
In the minute 68, The away team have replaced Ivan Rakitic with Nemanja Gudelj. This is the second substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
The away team replace Joan Jordan with Oliver Torres.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 69, Marcos Acuna (Sevilla) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 73, Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
In Bilbao, Inaki Williams of Bilbao is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Iker Muniain gets an equalizer for Bilbao. The score is now 1-1.
Mikel Vesga instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 79, Important block from the Sevilla defence as Inaki Williams fires in a strike for Bilbao.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sevilla's half?
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Bilbao throw-in in Sevilla's half.
In the minute 83, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 84, Sevilla drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Gaizka Garitano is making the team's fifth substitution at San Mames with Oihan Sancet replacing Jon Morcillo.
In the minute 86, Oihan Sancet puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Inaki Williams.
In the minute 88, In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Luuk De Jong with Carlos Fernandez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
Sevilla's Jesus Navas has been booked in Bilbao.
Munir El Haddadi is replacing Fernando for Sevilla at San Mames.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Sevilla.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Bilbao.
Unai Lopez is booked for the home team.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Bilbao.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Sevilla.
Throw-in for Sevilla at San Mames.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
That's full-time at San Mames. The final score is 2-1.
Diego Carlos (Sevilla) has received a first yellow card.
Carlos Fernandez (Sevilla) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
